files.name: index.js
toggle.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { Toggle as TogglePrimitive } from "bits-ui";
import { toggleVariants } from "./index.js";
import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
let {
  ref = $bindable(null),
  pressed = $bindable(),
  class: className,
  size,
  variant,
  ...restProps
} = $props();
</script>

<TogglePrimitive.Root
	bind:ref
	bind:pressed
	class={cn(toggleVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
	{...restProps}
/>
